        public Overlay subscribe(java.lang.String productId)
                  throws EMP_Exception
        Subscribes to the provided productId.
        Parameters:
        productId - the productId to subscribe to.
        Returns:
        an Overlay whose contents are managed by the MirrorCache

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct(Overlay overlay)
                throws EMP_Exception
        Signals intent to have the provided Overlay and its contents available to other users of the MirrorCache.
        Parameters:
        overlay - the Overlay to be managed by the MirrorCache
        Throws:
        EMP_Exception - If a MirrorCache error occurs

      • removeProduct

        public void removeProduct(Overlay overlay,
                          boolean allowSubscribersToKeep)
                   throws EMP_Exception
        Removes the Overlay from being available as a product within MirrorCache.
        Parameters:
        overlay - the Overlay to remove from MirrorCache
        allowSubscribersToKeep - if true, the local data previously received by subscribers via this product will not be purged
        Throws:
        EMP_Exception - If a MirrorCache error occurs
